00047 int dot_cnt;
00048 #define DOT_CLEAR()    do { dot_cnt=0; fflush(NULL); } while (0)
00049 #define DOT_TITLE(T,F) do { printf("dot: %-20s '%s'\n",T,F); fflush(NULL); } while (0)
00050 #define DOT_PRINT()    do { printf("dot: %2d.. \n",++dot_cnt); fflush(NULL); } while (0)
00051 #define DOT_OK()       do { printf("dot: ok!\n"); DOT_CLEAR(); } while (0)

00055 void run_test_consts() {
00056   FILE5_ASSERT((affx::FILE5_OPEN|affx::FILE5_RO)==affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void run_test_file(const std::string& file_name) {
00060   int should_be_zero;
00061 
00062   //
00063   DOT_TITLE("run_test_file",file_name.c_str());
00064   DOT_CLEAR();
00065 
00066   //
00067   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00068 
00069   // should be ok
00070   DOT_PRINT();
00071   unlink(file_name.c_str());
00072   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00073   file5->close();
00074 
00075   // should fail as file is there.
00076   DOT_PRINT();
00077   should_be_zero=0;
00078   try {
00079     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00080     should_be_zero=0; // error!
00081   }
00082   catch (...) {
00083     // ignore
00084   }
00085   FILE5_ASSERT(should_be_zero==0);
00086   //
00087   file5->close();
00088   
00089   // should be ok
00090   DOT_PRINT();
00091   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00092   file5->close();
00093 
00094   //
00095   DOT_PRINT();
00096   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00097   //
00098   file5->close();
00099   // it should be safe to call close twice...
00100   file5->flush();
00101   file5->close();
00102   // ...or more!
00103   file5->close();
00104 
00105   // should be ok.
00106   /*
00107   DOT_PRINT();
00108   unlink(file_name.c_str());
00109   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00110   file5->close();
00111   */
00112   //
00113   delete file5;
00114 
00115   //
00116   DOT_OK();
00117 }

00121 void run_test_matrix(const std::string& file_name) {
00122   // int should_be_zero;
00123 
00124   DOT_TITLE("run_test_matrix",file_name.c_str());
00125   DOT_CLEAR();
00126 
00127   affx::File5_File* file5;
00128   affx::File5_Matrix* matrix;
00129 
00130   int mat_dim1=3;
00131   int mat_dim0=7;
00132 
00133   //
00134   DOT_PRINT();
00135   {
00136     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00137     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00138     std::vector<int> matrix_dims=affx::file5_dims(mat_dim1,mat_dim0);
00139     matrix=file5->openMatrix("matrix",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,matrix_dims,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00140     //
00141     double val=0.0;
00142     std::vector<int> set_dims=affx::file5_dims(0,0);
00143     for (int d1=0;d1<mat_dim1;d1++) {
00144       set_dims[1]=d1;
00145       for (int d0=0;d0<mat_dim0;d0++) {
00146       set_dims[0]=d0;
00147       matrix->set(set_dims,val);
00148       val+=1.0;
00149       //printf("%f ",val);
00150       }
00151     }
00152 
00153     //
00154     matrix->close();
00155     delete matrix;
00156     file5->close();
00157     delete file5;
00158   }
00159 
00160   //printf("xxx1\n"); fflush(NULL);
00161   /*
00162   //
00163   DOT_PRINT();
00164   should_be_zero=0;
00165   try {
00166     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00167     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00168     std::vector<int> matrix_dims=affx::file5_dims(mat_dim1,mat_dim0);
00169     matrix=file5->openMatrix("matrix",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,matrix_dims,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00170     //
00171     // should abort as we didnt close the matrix.
00172     // matrix->close();
00173     file5->close();
00174     should_be_zero=1;
00175     printf("### Error! shouldnt make it here!\n");
00176   }
00177   catch (...) {
00178     //
00179   }
00180   FILE5_ASSERT(should_be_zero==0);
00181 
00182   printf("xxx2\n"); fflush(NULL);
00183 
00184   // this should close it.
00185   DOT_PRINT();
00186   matrix->close();
00187   delete matrix;
00188   file5->close();
00189   delete file5;
00190   */
00191   /*
00192   //
00193   DOT_PRINT();
00194   {
00195     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00196     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00197     std::vector<int> matrix_dims=affx::file5_dims(10,20);
00198     matrix=file5->openMatrix("matrix",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,matrix_dims,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00199     //
00200     double val_ref=0.0;
00201     double val_out;
00202     std::vector<int> set_dims=affx::file5_dims(0,0);
00203     for (int d1=0;d1<mat_dim1;d1++) {
00204       set_dims[1]=d1;
00205       for (int d0=0;d0<mat_dim0;d0++) {
00206         set_dims[0]=d0;
00207         //printf("%f ",val_ref);
00208         matrix->get(set_dims,&val_out);
00209         FILE5_ASSERT(val_out==val_ref);
00210         val_ref+=1.0;
00211       }
00212     }
00213     // test for values.
00214     //
00215     matrix->close();
00216     file5->close();
00217   }
00218   */
00219   DOT_PRINT();
00220   DOT_OK();
00221 }

00226 void run_test_vector_string_size(const std::string& file_name,int size,int compress)
00227 {
00228   //
00229   DOT_TITLE("run_test_vector_string",file_name.c_str());
00230   DOT_CLEAR();
00231   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00232   affx::File5_Vector* vec;
00233 
00234   //
00235   DOT_PRINT();
00236   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE|affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00237   //vec=file5->openVector_String("vector-string",size,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00238   vec=file5->createVector();
00239   vec->setOptCompress(compress);
00240   vec->setOptStringSize(100);
00241   vec->open("vector-string",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00242   //
00243   vec->attrib_set("foo","bar");
00244   //
00245   vec->setBufferSize(100);
00246   //
00247   std::string vec_name;
00248   vec->get_name(&vec_name);
00249   printf("vec_name='%s'\n",vec_name.c_str());
00250   //
00251   for (int i=0;i<20;i++) {
00252     char buf[100];
00253     sprintf(buf,"string-1-%d",i);
00254     vec->push_back_string(buf);
00255   }
00256   vec->assign_string( 0,"zero");
00257   vec->assign_string(10,"ten");
00258   vec->assign_string(11,"eleven");
00259   // vec->dump(); file5->dump();
00260   vec->close();
00261   delete vec;
00262   // vec->dump(); file5->dump();
00263   file5->close();
00264   delete file5;
00265   // vec->dump(); file5->dump();
00266 
00267   //
00268   DOT_PRINT();
00269   file5=new affx::File5_File();
00270   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00271   //vec=file5->openVector("vector-string-2",0);
00272   vec=file5->openVector("vector-string");
00273   //
00274   vec->setBufferSize(1);
00275   vec->assign_string(0,"string-2-0");
00276   vec->push_back_string("string-2-1");
00277   vec->push_back_string("string-2-2");
00278   vec->push_back_string("string-2-3");
00279   vec->push_back_string("string-2-4");
00280   //
00281   vec->close();
00282   delete vec;
00283   file5->close();
00284   delete file5;
00285   //
00286   DOT_OK();
00287 }

00289 void run_test_vector_1_print(affx::File5_Vector* vec,int len,int buf_size)
00290 {
00291   printf("TESTING len=%d buf=%d --------------------\n",len,buf_size);
00292   int val;
00293   vec->setBufferSize(buf_size);
00294   for (int i=0;i<len;i++) {
00295     vec->get(i,&val);
00296     printf("%d,",val);
00297   }
00298   printf("\n");
00299 }

00302 void run_test_vector_1_w(const std::string& file_name,
00303                          const affx::File5_dtype_t dtype
00304                          )
00305 {
00306   affx::File5_File* file5;
00307   affx::File5_Vector* vec;
00308 
00309   file5=new affx::File5_File();
00310   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00311 
00312   //
00313   vec=file5->openVector(file_name,dtype,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00314   for (int j=0;j<100;j++) {
00315     vec->push_back(j+0);
00316   }
00317   vec->dump();
00318 
00319   run_test_vector_1_print(vec,10,100);
00320 
00321   vec->close();
00322   delete vec;
00323   file5->close();
00324   delete file5;
00325 }
00326 
00327 void run_test_vector_1_r(const std::string& file_name,
00328                          const affx::File5_dtype_t dtype
00329                          )
00330 {
00331   affx::File5_File* file5;
00332   affx::File5_Vector* vec;
00333 
00334   file5=new affx::File5_File();
00335   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00336 
00337   //
00338   vec=file5->openVector(file_name,dtype,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00339 
00340   run_test_vector_1_print(vec,10,100);
00341 
00342   vec->close();
00343   delete vec;
00344   file5->close();
00345   delete file5;
00346 }

00348 void run_test_vector_1(const std::string& file_name) {
00349   //
00350   DOT_TITLE("run_test_matrix",file_name.c_str());
00351   DOT_CLEAR();
00352 
00353   run_test_vector_1_w(file_name+"-int",   affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00354   run_test_vector_1_r(file_name+"-int",   affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00355   //
00356   run_test_vector_1_w(file_name+"-short", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT);
00357   run_test_vector_1_r(file_name+"-short", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT);
00358   //
00359   run_test_vector_1_w(file_name+"-char",  affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR);
00360   run_test_vector_1_r(file_name+"-char",  affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR);
00361 }

00363 void run_test_vector_2(const std::string& file_name) {
00364   //int should_be_zero;
00365 
00366   //
00367   DOT_TITLE("run_test_matrix",file_name.c_str());
00368   DOT_CLEAR();
00369 
00370   affx::File5_File* file5;
00371   affx::File5_Vector* vector;
00372 
00373   int vec_len=10;
00374 
00375   //
00376   DOT_PRINT();
00377   {
00378     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00379     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00380     vector=file5->openVector("vector",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00381 
00382     //
00383     FILE5_ASSERT(vector->file5_dtype()==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00384 
00385     //
00386     float val_out=0.0; // float for testing.
00387     for (int d0=0;d0<vec_len;d0++) {
00388       vector->push_back_d(val_out);
00389       val_out+=1.00;
00390     }
00391 
00392     //
00393     vector->close();
00394     delete vector;
00395     file5->close();
00396     delete file5;
00397   }
00398 
00399   //printf("xxx1\n"); fflush(NULL);
00400 
00401   //
00402   DOT_PRINT();
00403   //should_be_zero=0;
00404 
00405   /*
00406     // the close of the file aborts -- disable this test.
00407   try {
00408     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00409     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00410     vector=file5->openVector("vector",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00411     //
00412     // should abort as we didnt close the vector.
00413     // vector->close();
00414     file5->close();
00415     //should_be_zero=1;
00416     printf("### Error! shouldnt make it here!\n");
00417   }
00418   catch (...) {
00419     //
00420   }
00421   //FILE5_ASSERT(should_be_zero==0);
00422   // this should close it.
00423   DOT_PRINT();
00424   vector->close();
00425   delete vector;
00426   file5->close();
00427   delete file5;
00428   */
00429 
00430   //
00431   DOT_PRINT();
00432   {
00433     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00434     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00435     std::vector<int> vector_dims=affx::file5_dims(10,20);
00436     vector=file5->openVector("vector",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00437     //
00438     double val_ref=0.0;
00439     double val_in;
00440     for (int d0=0;d0<vec_len;d0++) {
00441       vector->get(d0,&val_in);
00442       FILE5_ASSERT(val_in==val_ref);
00443       val_ref+=1.00;
00444     }
00445     // test for values.
00446     //
00447     vector->close();
00448     delete vector;
00449     file5->close();
00450     delete file5;
00451   }
00452 
00453   DOT_PRINT();
00454   DOT_OK();
00455 }

00457 void run_test_vector_3(const std::string& file_name) {
00458   int tmp_int;
00459   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00460   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00461   affx::File5_Vector* vec=file5->openVector("vector",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00462 
00463   std::vector<int> data(10,1);
00464 
00465   vec->write_vector(0,&data);
00466   FILE5_ASSERT(vec->size()==10);
00467 
00468   data.resize(5);
00469   vec->write_vector(0,&data);
00470   FILE5_ASSERT(vec->size()==10);
00471 
00472   data.resize(20);
00473   vec->write_vector(0,&data);
00474   FILE5_ASSERT(vec->size()==20);
00475 
00476   vec->push_back_i(21);
00477   FILE5_ASSERT(vec->size()==21);
00478 
00479   vec->resize(10);
00480   vec->push_back_i(1100);
00481   FILE5_ASSERT(vec->size()==11);
00482   vec->get(10,&tmp_int);
00483   FILE5_ASSERT(tmp_int==1100);
00484   
00485   vec->close();
00486   delete vec;
00487   file5->close();
00488   delete file5;
00489 }

00491 void run_test_usermeta(const std::string& file_name) {
00492   // 
00493   DOT_TITLE("run_test_user_meta",file_name.c_str());
00494   DOT_CLEAR();
00495   //
00496   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00497   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00498   //
00499   file5->addHeader("key","val");
00500   file5->addHeader("foo","bar");
00501   file5->addHeader("abc","def");
00502   //
00503   for (int i=0;i<file5->getHeaderCount();i++) {
00504     std::string key;
00505     std::string val;
00506     file5->getHeaderByIdx(i,&key,&val);
00507     printf("#%%%s=%s\n",key.c_str(),val.c_str());
00508   }
00509 
00510   //
00511   file5->close();
00512   delete file5;
00513   //
00514   DOT_PRINT();
00515   DOT_OK();
00516 }
00517 
00518 void run_test_usermeta_big(const std::string& file_name) {
00519   // 
00520   DOT_TITLE("run_test_usermeta_big",file_name.c_str());
00521   DOT_CLEAR();
00522   //
00523   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00524   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00525   //
00526   for (int i=0;i<1000;i++) {
00527     char key_buf[32];
00528     sprintf(key_buf,"key%05d",i);
00529     char val_buf[32];
00530     sprintf(val_buf,"val%05d",i);
00531     file5->addHeader(key_buf,val_buf);
00532   }
00533   //
00534   for (int i=0;i<file5->getHeaderCount();i++) {
00535     std::string key;
00536     std::string val;
00537     file5->getHeaderByIdx(i,&key,&val);
00538     if ((i%100)==0) {
00539       printf("%4d : #%%%s=%s\n",i,key.c_str(),val.c_str());
00540     }
00541   }
00542   //
00543   file5->close();
00544   delete file5;
00545   //
00546   DOT_PRINT();
00547   DOT_OK();
00548 }

00551 
00552 void run_test_tsv_write(const std::string& file_name)
00553 {
00554   DOT_TITLE("run_test_tsv_write",file_name.c_str());
00555   DOT_CLEAR();
00556   
00557   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00558   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00559 
00560   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=file5->openTsv("tsv",affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00561   
00562   std::string col_name="test-column";
00563   tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,col_name,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00564 
00565   // check the types
00566   FILE5_ASSERT(tsv5->getColumnDtype(0,0)==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00567   FILE5_ASSERT(tsv5->getColumnDtype(0,10)==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_UNKNOWN);
00568   //
00569   FILE5_ASSERT(tsv5->getColumnDtype(0,"test-column")==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00570   FILE5_ASSERT(tsv5->getColumnDtype(0,"noSuchColumn")==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_UNKNOWN);
00571 
00572   for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
00573     // good cases
00574     if (tsv5->set_i(0,0,i)!=affx::FILE5_OK) {
00575       FILE5_ASSERT(0);
00576     }
00577     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00578     if (tsv5->set_i(0,col_name,i)!=affx::FILE5_OK) {
00579       FILE5_ASSERT(0);
00580     }
00581     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00582 
00583     // bad cases
00584     if (tsv5->set_i(0,-1,i)==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00585       FILE5_ASSERT(0);
00586     }
00587     if (tsv5->set_i(0,"bad_col",i)==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00588       FILE5_ASSERT(0);
00589     }
00590     if (tsv5->set_i(9,col_name,i)==affx::FILE5_OK) {
00591       FILE5_ASSERT(0);
00592     }
00593   }
00594   //
00595   tsv5->close();
00596   delete tsv5;
00597   file5->close();
00598   delete file5;
00599 }
00600 
00601 
00602 void run_test_twoleveltsv(const std::string& file_name)
00603 {
00604   DOT_TITLE("run_test_twoleveltsv",file_name.c_str());
00605   DOT_CLEAR();
00606 
00607   int rv;
00608   int val;
00609   int val_ref;
00610   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00611   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00612 
00613   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=file5->openTsv("tsv",affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00614 
00615   //
00616   tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"col-0-0",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00617   tsv5->defineColumn(1,0,"col-1-0",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00618 
00619   //
00620   val=0;
00621   for (int l0=0;l0<5;l0++) {
00622     tsv5->set_i(0,0,val++*100);
00623     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00624     for (int l1=0;l1<5;l1++) {
00625       tsv5->set_i(1,0,val++);
00626       tsv5->writeLevel(1);
00627     }
00628   }
00629 
00630   if (1) {
00631     tsv5->close();
00632     delete tsv5;
00633     file5->close();
00634     delete file5;
00635 
00636     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00637     file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00638     tsv5=file5->openTsv("tsv",affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00639   }
00640 
00641   //
00642   tsv5->rewind();
00643   val_ref=0;
00644   val=0;
00645   for (int l0=0;l0<5;l0++) {
00646     tsv5->nextLine();
00647     tsv5->get(0,0,&val);
00648     FILE5_ASSERT(val==val_ref*100);
00649     val_ref++;
00650     for (int l1=0;l1<5;l1++) {
00651       tsv5->nextLine();
00652       tsv5->get(1,0,&val);
00653       FILE5_ASSERT(val==val_ref);
00654       val_ref++;
00655     }
00656   }
00657   // should be an error
00658   rv=tsv5->nextLine();
00659   FILE5_ASSERT(rv!=affx::FILE5_OK);
00660 
00661   //
00662   tsv5->close();
00663   delete tsv5;
00664   file5->close();
00665   delete file5;
00666 }
00667 
00668 //////////
00669 
00670 void run_test_tsv_delete_mk(affx::File5_File* file5,
00671                             const std::string& tsv_name)
00672 {
00673   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=file5->openTsv(tsv_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00674   //
00675   tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"col-0-0",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00676   tsv5->defineColumn(0,1,"col-0-1",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00677   //
00678   int val=0;
00679   for (int l=0;l<5;l++) {
00680     tsv5->set_i(0,0,val++);
00681     tsv5->set_i(0,1,val++);
00682     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00683   }
00684   //
00685   tsv5->close();
00686   delete tsv5;
00687 }
00688   
00689 void run_test_tsv_delete(const std::string& file_name)
00690 {
00691   DOT_TITLE("run_test_tsv_delete",file_name.c_str());
00692   DOT_CLEAR();
00693   
00694   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00695   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00696 
00697   // make two tables
00698   run_test_tsv_delete_mk(file5,"tsv-1");
00699   run_test_tsv_delete_mk(file5,"tsv-deleteme");
00700   run_test_tsv_delete_mk(file5,"tsv-2");
00701 
00702   //
00703   file5->deleteTsv("tsv-deleteme");
00704   file5->deleteTsv("tsv-doesnotexists");
00705 
00706   //
00707   file5->close();
00708   delete file5;
00709 }

00712 
00713 #define BENCHMARK_COL_CNT 10
00714 
00715 void run_test_benchmark_write(const std::string& file_name,int benchmark_cnt)
00716 {
00717   printf("FILE5_CHUNKSIZE        = %5d\n", FILE5_CHUNKSIZE);
00718   printf("FILE5_DEFAULT_COMPRESS = %5d\n", FILE5_DEFAULT_COMPRESS);
00719   //
00720   DOT_TITLE("run_test_benchmark_write",file_name.c_str());
00721   DOT_CLEAR();
00722 
00723 
00724   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00725   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00726   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=file5->openTsv("benchmark",affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00727   
00728   for (int cidx=0;cidx<BENCHMARK_COL_CNT;cidx++) {
00729     char buf[100];
00730     sprintf(buf,"col-%04d",cidx);
00731     tsv5->defineColumn(0,cidx,buf,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00732   }
00733 
00734   //
00735   int cnt=0;
00736   while (cnt<benchmark_cnt) {
00737     for (int cidx=0;cidx<BENCHMARK_COL_CNT;cidx++) {
00738       tsv5->set_d(0,cidx,(cnt++)+0.123456);
00739     }
00740     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00741   }
00742   
00743   //
00744   tsv5->close();
00745   delete tsv5;
00746   file5->close();
00747   delete file5;
00748 }
00749 
00750 void run_test_vec_strlen_1(const std::string& file_base,int strlen)
00751 {
00752   //
00753   char buf[100];
00754 
00755   //
00756   sprintf(buf,"%s-%03d",file_base.c_str(),strlen);
00757   std::string file_name=buf;
00758   printf("  file=%s\n",file_name.c_str());
00759   //
00760   DOT_CLEAR();
00761 
00762 
00763   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00764   file5->open(file_name,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00765   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5=file5->openTsv("tsv",affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00766 
00767   tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"string",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING,strlen);  
00768   int val=0;
00769   for (int i=0;i<100000;i++) {
00770     // psudo-random
00771     // val=val*23*val+val+10;
00772     // sequental
00773     val++;
00774     sprintf(buf,"%u%u",val,val);
00775     // fix the length at 10.
00776     buf[11]=0;
00777     tsv5->set_string(0,0,buf);
00778     tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00779   }
00780   
00781   //
00782   tsv5->close();
00783   delete tsv5;
00784   file5->close();
00785   delete file5;
00786 }
00787 
00788 void run_test_vec_strlen(const std::string& file_base)
00789 {
00790   printf("Strlen compression test ==\n");
00791   // why busted?
00792   // run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base,  0);
00793   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base, 10);
00794   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base, 20);
00795   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base, 30);
00796   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base, 40);
00797   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base, 50);
00798   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base,100);
00799   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base,150);
00800   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base,200);
00801   run_test_vec_strlen_1(file_base,300);
00802 }

00804 //////////
00805 
00806 void run_test_open_many() {
00807   std::vector<affx::File5_File*> files_vec;
00808   affx::File5_File* file5;
00809   char fname_buf[200];
00810 
00811   int i=0;
00812   while (1) {
00813     sprintf(fname_buf,"test-open-many-%06d",i++);
00814     file5=new affx::File5_File();
00815     files_vec.push_back(file5);
00816     file5->open(fname_buf,affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00817     printf("test-open-many: '%s'\n",fname_buf);
00818   }
00819 }
00820 
00821 //////////
00822 
00823 void run_test_big_vector(affx::File5_File* file5,int size) {
00824   assert(file5!=NULL);
00825 
00826   printf("test-big-vector: %10d...\n",size); fflush(NULL);
00827   if (size>1000000) {
00828     sleep(10);
00829   }
00830 
00831   int* buf=(int*)malloc(sizeof(int)*size);
00832   assert(buf!=NULL);
00833   
00834   memset(buf,0,size);
00835   for (int i=0;i<size;i++) {
00836     buf[i]=i;
00837   }
00838 
00839   char vec_name[100];
00840   sprintf(vec_name,"vec-%09d",size);
00841 
00842   affx::File5_Vector* vec;
00843   vec=file5->openVector(vec_name,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00844 
00845   printf("   write_array...\n"); fflush(NULL);
00846 
00847   vec->write_array(0,size,buf);
00848 
00849   free(buf);
00850   vec->close();
00851   delete vec;
00852 
00853   printf("\n"); fflush(NULL);
00854 }
00855   
00856 void run_test_big_vectors(const std::string& filename) {
00857   affx::File5_File* file5=new affx::File5_File();
00858   file5->open(filename,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00859 
00860   int sizes[]={ 
00861     // 100,
00862     // 10000,
00863     100000,
00864     // 1000,     2000,   5000,
00865     // 10000,   20000,  50000,
00866     // 100000, 200000, 500000,
00867     // 1000000000,
00868     -1};
00869               
00870   for (int i=0;sizes[i]!=-1;i++) {
00871     run_test_big_vector(file5, sizes[i]);
00872   }
00873 
00874   file5->close();
00875   delete file5;
00876 }
00877 
00878 //////////
00879 
00880 // For generating a bunch of tsvfiles
00881 void
00882 run_test_text_tsv()
00883 {
00884   char str_buf[100];
00885   affx::File5_File* file5;
00886   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5;
00887 
00888   for (int s_width=10;s_width<20;s_width++) {
00889     for (int s_cnt=1;s_cnt<10;s_cnt++) {
00890       //
00891       sprintf(str_buf,"test-text-tsv-%03d-%03d.file5",s_width,s_cnt);
00892       file5=new affx::File5_File();
00893       file5->open(str_buf,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00894       //
00895       printf("Writing '%s'...\n",str_buf);
00896       //
00897       tsv5=file5->openTsv("tsv",affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00898       tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"test-column",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING,s_width);
00899       //
00900       for (int c=0;c<s_cnt*100;c++) {
00901         sprintf(str_buf,"%d-%d",s_width,c);
00902         tsv5->set_string(0,0,str_buf);
00903         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00904       }
00905       //
00906       tsv5->close();
00907       delete tsv5;
00908       file5->close();
00909       delete file5;
00910     }
00911   }
00912 }
00913 
00914 //////////
00915 
00916 void print_vos(const std::vector<std::string>& vec)
00917 {
00918   for (int i=0;i<vec.size();i++) {
00919     printf(" %2d: '%s'\n",i,vec[i].c_str());
00920   }
00921 }
00922 
00923 void run_test_list_names(const std::string& filename)
00924 {
00925   affx::File5_File* file5;
00926   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5;
00927 
00928   file5=new affx::File5_File();
00929   file5->open(filename,affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00930 
00931   tsv5=file5->openTsv("tsv",affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00932   tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"col-000",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00933   tsv5->defineColumn(0,1,"col-001",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00934 
00935   std::vector<std::string> names;
00936   names=tsv5->listNames();
00937   print_vos(names);
00938 
00939   names=file5->listNames();
00940   print_vos(names);
00941   
00942   //
00943   tsv5->close();
00944   delete tsv5;
00945   file5->close();
00946   delete file5;
00947 }

00949 //////////
00950 
00951 void define_testfile5_options(PgOptions* opts)
00952 {
00953   opts->setUsage("test-file5 -- A file5 test program.");
00954 
00955   opts->defOpt("h","help",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00956                "Print this message.",
00957                "false");
00958   // file
00959   opts->defOpt("tf","test-file",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00960                "File test",
00961                "true");
00962   // matrix
00963   opts->defOpt("tm","test-matrix",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00964                "Matrix test",
00965                "true");
00966   // vector
00967   opts->defOpt("tv","test-vector",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00968                "Vector test",
00969                "true");
00970   //
00971   opts->defOpt("tum","test-user-meta",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00972                "Vector test",
00973                "true");
00974   //
00975   opts->defOpt("tsv","test-tsv",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00976                "Tsv5 test",
00977                "true");
00978   opts->defOpt("","test-vec-strlen",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00979                "test-vec-strlen",
00980                "false");
00981   // stress testing
00982   opts->defOpt("","test-open-many",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00983                "test-open-many",
00984                "false");
00985   opts->defOpt("","test-big-vectors",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00986                "test-big-vectors",
00987                "false");
00988   opts->defOpt("","test-text-tsv",PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00989                "test-text-tsv",
00990                "false");
00991   //
00992   opts->defineOption("","benchmark", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00993                      "Number of doubles to write for benchmarking output.",
00994                      "0");
00995   opts->defOpt("o","output",PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00996                "output file",
00997                "");
00998 
00999 }
01000 
01001 //////////
01002 
01003 int main(int argc, const char* argv[])
01004 {
01005   PgOptions* opts;
01006   int num_run=0;
01007 
01008   // quick enough to run each time.
01009   run_test_consts();
01010 
01011   //
01012   affx::File5_open();
01013 
01014   // throw our errors for testing.
01015   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
01016 
01017   // Create our option parser, define the options and parse.
01018   opts = new PgOptions;
01019   define_testfile5_options(opts);
01020   opts->parseArgv(argv);
01021 
01022   // Print our help message if necessary.
01023   if (opts->getBool("help")) {
01024     opts->usage();
01025     return 0;
01026   }
01027 
01028   //
01029   run_test_list_names("test-list-names.file5");
01030 
01031   ////
01032   if (opts->getInt("benchmark")!=0) {
01033     run_test_benchmark_write(opts->get("output"),opts->getInt("benchmark"));
01034     return 0;
01035   }
01036   if (opts->getBool("test-big-vectors")) {
01037     run_test_big_vectors("test-big-vectors.file5");
01038     return 0;
01039   }
01040   if (opts->getBool("test-text-tsv")) {
01041     run_test_text_tsv();
01042     return 0;
01043   }
01044 
01045   /////
01046   if (opts->getBool("test-file")) {
01047     num_run++;
01048     run_test_file("test-file5-file.file5");
01049   }
01050   //
01051   if (opts->getBool("test-matrix")) {
01052     num_run++;
01053     run_test_matrix("test-file5-matrix.file5");
01054   }
01055   //
01056   if (opts->getBool("test-vector")) {
01057     num_run++;
01058     run_test_vector_1("test-file5-vector.file5");
01059     run_test_vector_2("test-file5-vector.file5");
01060     run_test_vector_3("test-file5-vector-3.file5");
01061     //
01062     run_test_vector_string_size("test-file5-vectorstring-z.file5",20,5);
01063     run_test_vector_string_size("test-file5-vectorstring-nz.file5",20,0);
01064   }
01065   //
01066   if (opts->getBool("test-user-meta")) {
01067     run_test_usermeta("test-file5-usermeta.file5");
01068     run_test_usermeta_big("test-file5-usermeta-big.file5");
01069   }
01070 
01071   if (opts->getBool("test-open-many")) {
01072     run_test_open_many();
01073   }
01074 
01075   // 
01076   if (opts->getBool("test-tsv")) {
01077     num_run++;
01078     std::string file_name="test-file5-tsv.file5";
01079     run_test_tsv_write(file_name);
01080     run_test_tsv_write(file_name);
01081     run_test_twoleveltsv("test-file5-twolevel.file5");
01082     //
01083     run_test_tsv_delete("test-file5-tsv-delete.file5");
01084   }
01085 
01086   if (opts->getBool("test-vec-strlen")) {
01087     run_test_vec_strlen("test-vec-strlen");
01088     num_run++;
01089   }
01090 
01091   //
01092   if (num_run==0) {
01093     opts->usage();
01094   }
01095 
01096   //
01097   delete opts;
01098 
01099   // to test what happens without the close.
01100   // _exit(0);
01101 
01102   //
01103   affx::File5_close();
01104 
01105   return 0;
01106 }
